product_name: Bonk Breaker High Protein Energy Bar
long_description: The Bonk Breaker High Protein energy bar is packed with 15g of protein. Building muscle has never tasted so good! Tasty Peanut Butter and Jelly flavor combines crunchy peanut butter with strawberry jam. Bonk Breaker High Protein energy bars are gluten free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
